text:
Influenza vs #COVID19:

Influenza: Most at risk for severe infection are 👧🏽👦🏻, 🤰🏻, 👵🏻👴🏾, those with underlying chronic medical conditions &  immunosuppressed

COVID-19: Our current understanding is that
👵🏾👴🏼& those with underlying conditions are most at risk for severe infection https://t.co/firLuNGnx7
